Bosses.Name: Psycheflayer
Bosses.Strategy:
When you first walk into the boss arena an only an enemy called the Lunatic Priest will be here once this enemy reaches 50%% HP he will summon the Pyscheflayer. Players should focus on killing the Lunatic Priest before dealing with the Psycheflayer as the Lunatic Priest will throw out high damage AOEs. 

Throughout the fight Psycheflayer will spawn adds that cast AOEs players should make sure to kill them as soon as they spawn.

KeyMechanics.Name: Water
KeyMechanics.Description: Targeted attack that deals a small amount of damage.

KeyMechanics.Name: Void Thunder III
KeyMechanics.Description: Targeted attack that deals a large amount of damage.

KeyMechanics.Name: Canker
KeyMechanics.Description: Targeted attack that will inflict the Disease debuff

KeyMechanics.Name: Mind Melt
KeyMechanics.Description: Raid wide attack that deals moderate damage to the party.

Bosses.Name: Demon Wall
Bosses.Strategy:
The Demon Wall will always follow a pattern, it will always use Liquefy four times before using repel. 

After two uses of Repel the demon wall will summon two Adds called Bloodlapper that can inflict the Paralysis debuff, make sure to kill them as soon as they spawn.

KeyMechanics.Name: Muder Hole
KeyMechanics.Description: Targeted attack that deals a small amount of damage.

KeyMechanics.Name: Repel
KeyMechanics.Description: After the Demon Wall finishes casting repel all players will be knocked back away from the boss. Players must position themselves so they arent knocked back off the platform

KeyMechanics.Name: Liquefy
KeyMechanics.Description: liquefy is a line AOE that can come from the two sides of the platform or the middle. It deals high damage and will inflict the Heavy debuff if youre hit by the middle AOE and the Slow debuff if youre hit by the side AOE.

Bosses.Name: Anantaboga
Bosses.Strategy: Throughout the fight Anantaboga will use Imminent Catastrophe to spawn red orbs that deal damage to anyone in line of sight, to avoid this players must hide behind on of 4 statues around the arena. Additionally, the cast will awake one of the statues turning it into an add, players must kill the add and avoid its AOEs.

KeyMechanics.Name: Tail Drive
KeyMechanics.Description: Tail Drive is a rear cone AOE that will deal high damage and inflict the Concussion debuff causing damage over time to anyone hit.

KeyMechanics.Name: Rotten Breath
KeyMechanics.Description: Rotten Breath is a frontal cone AOE that deals high damage and will inflict the Disease debuff to anyone hit

KeyMechanics.Name: Imminent Catastrophe
KeyMechanics.Description: After the cast a red orb will appear in the middle of the arena and deal high damage to anyone in line of sight.

KeyMechanics.Name: Plague Dance
KeyMechanics.Description: The boss will use a purple beam on a random player after aa while a red orb will appear at the location of the player hit and deal damage to anyone around it.
